content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my backyard enjoying the cool air and looking up at the stars when a ball of light with a long tail trailing behind it making no noise streaking over my yard never changing direction or altitude all i could do was freeze, i couldn't move i was aww struck and could feel every sense in my body just go crazy like when there is extreme danger around. after about a second or two the light just seem to dim out and it wasn't visible anymore, i didn't see any smoke or any kind of cloud that would have been left behind in it's trail like a rocket would. once it was gone and my body stopped tingling i composed myself and i dismissed it as a shooting star but now that i think about it there is no way it would be that low to the ground.
content.summary: Looked like a shooting star with a long tail but was way to low to be a star.

content.detailedDescription: hemos sido "visitados" por el "chupacabras". mat�� 30 gallinas, un gallo de aproximadamente 60 cm de altura y una zariguella, absorbiendo toda la sangre de los animales, dej��ndolos con orificios de una pulgada de di��metro debajo de las alas y en los pechos; tambi��n presentaban dos perforaciones (aparentemente realizados con agujas, o elementos similares)una al lado de la otra. tengo fotos de todo lo relatado pero se encuentra en un disco duro, guardado. tambi��n se hab��an apersonado al lugar del hecho camar��grafos de un canal de aire, como tambi��n de un peri��dico local. hay varios testigos del hecho, el cual fue muy impresionante. independientemente a lo relatado, me gustar��a ser parte de mufon. desde ya mis saludos, esperando que mi experiencia les sea de interes.
content.summary: Chupacabras

content.detailedDescription: While siting in my home around 3:45am on april 29, 2014, i began to hear a chopping type noise like helicopters, but much more quiet than any helicopter i've ever heard, outside. naturally i went outside to see what was going on. this is when i saw the first craft, which was a saucer like object, heading towards the west. it was completely black and i wouldn't have been able to see it if it did not have it's red and white lights on the sides of it. it moved with ease, and performed what appeared to be somewhat of an air show. performing banking circular turns and moving up and down in altitude while hovering. after viewing this for a few minutes, i heard another chopping sound similar to a helicopter but again the noise was muffled and dampened. i will note that this object had a higher pitch to it's sound which i used to differentiate between the two objects. i then saw what appeared to be a cigar shaped craft, which looked very similar to a drone but with no wings visibly on it. i want to be very clear, even though i heard the sounds of helicopter blades, i saw no blades on either object. so i'm standing looking at the cigar shaped object, moving again towards the west, it then reversed it's direction and started to move towards me. it lined up with my vision and appeared to be only two red lights floating in the sky, i then got the sensation that it was staring right at me. it kept coming towards me, while still being above the tree line. as it got closer, i began to back up, thinking it was heading for me, it then stopped and hovered for a few seconds, still pointing at me, only to perform a u-turn and head back west over the tree line. at this point, i ran inside to grab my camera which i had left inside unfortunately. coming back outside i could still hear both objects, and could still see the saucer like craft hovering above the tree line. this is when things got confusing to me. i saw the saucer craft hovering in the distance but didn't have a view on the cigar shaped object, yet it sounded as if the cigar craft was moving back to the south east, the direction it came from. i heard it overhead but saw absolutely nothing, no lights, no silhouette, just the sky above me. i know the technology exists to project sound waves in certain directions. and i can't help but think that whatever this craft was, it knew i got a good look at it, and it didn't want to be seen again, so it could've possibly either turned invisible, or used sound technologies to fool me while it went a different direction, but i never saw it again, which confuses me still since i could still hear it, and was obviously keeping an eye out for it and would have seen it rise into the air. i was able to get a few blurry photos of the saucer like craft before it headed off back to the south east. i know the photos don't show much if anything at all, but at least it's proof that something unusual was flying in the sky that night. in my opinion, for what it's worth, i think this was a military test of some type of classified technology, and not a ufo in the traditional sense of carrying extra terrestrials. whatever was in the sky that night, i've certainly never seen anything like it, and have yet to come across anything similar in my little research into it.
content.summary: Two black objects, one saucer shaped, one cigar shaped, hovering over bruce b downs area.

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving down bullheadly road (this is in tallahassee florida) at about 9 pm when i saw two bright lights, brighter and different from any airplane lights i've seen. i told the driver of the car to keep going and not turn so we can see what it was. as we got closer and closer (we are on a road heading right for a lake called lake iamonia) we noticed that it was not moving, seemingly hovering. we went right to the lake front and parked with our lights on. it was hovering at the center of the lake. i am not sure how big it exactly was, but it wasn't small, and it was hovering about 200 feet up. it had two main bright lights on its wings and a smaller white light on the front. we watched it for about 5 minutes, just sitting there hovering. i decided to take a picture of it to show people, but i forgot to turn off the flash. right after i flashed the camera (the photo is not that good) it started coming toward us. we were still interested, so we rolled down the window to get a look. the sound was a quiet droning noise, almost like an airplane that is very, very high up in the sky ( just a reminder again, it wasn't high in the sky at all). it wasn't going fast to start out with, but when it went over us and we turned around to follow it, it spend up gradually to a speed we could not even match with our car. we also noticed as it was over us that there definitely was two wings, on the side of it there was small red lights, and it was a sharp triangle. that was the last we saw of it, going out into the distance.
to specify the shape it was an equilateral triangle, with to points being what i thought were the wing like, though it didn't seem to use them as wigs.
content.summary: Triangle object/ 2 bright,1 dim light/ hovered/ flash from camera made it move towards and over us

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home 1/4 mile from my house then noticed 5 bright stationary triangular lights above the trees pulled my car over got out looking up at this i couldnot believe what i was seeing i was not just seeing things i know what i saw. i  then saw the two lights on left go out then two on the right went out then the one in the middle like shrunk to a disappearing like withdrew completely. there was no noise no nothing just clear blue sky no clouds or nothing  i will not be quiet about this ever no matter what anyone military or otherwise will say. coverups just make me upset.   ifmufon contacts me then ok  ps. im allergic to sodiumpenathal so don't try that either as seen on some mufon  tv shows i have seen
content.summary: Seen 5 trianle lights above trees 2 min. then disapeared no structure at all i know what i seen will never keep quiet about this

content.detailedDescription: Having a cigaret out side just gazing into the sky (it was not raining). i witnessed the circle of light traveling south. suddenly turning west without stopping. it then disappeared into the distance at incredible speed. wow i thought.
content.summary: Observed the bright orb at high speed in directions idicated, turning direction in an instant, flying off in the distance.

content.detailedDescription: I was laying in my bed when i heard what sounding like to be an airplane passing over, i looked out the window and saw a few dozen white lights clustered together to form two circles with one red light in front forming a triangle, it looked like there was some sort if structure formed around the lights, but the lights were so bright it was hard to tell. it was there and gone in a matter of seconds. about five minutes later i heard sirens come and go for about 20 min.
content.summary: The object flew fairly low over my apartments in a period of about 5 sec

content.detailedDescription:
I was in room looking outside from an opened window.

the object just popped out of nowhere.

i have never seen an aircraft travel at such speeds.

the object traveling nw at incredible speeds and at low altitude without making any sound.  i could not believe how fast the ufo was traveling, and was unsure why there was no sound made.

i was shocked after i saw the object, and tried to find another explanation in my room.  

the object travel at incredible speed, where i was no longer able to see it in my field of vision.
content.summary: Object traveling at incredible speed making no sound

content.detailedDescription: I stay with my grandmother due to her having altimers. and my husband son and i were on our way to releive my dad from staying there at night... so anyway we were driving down hwy 136 and i saw it while i was on the hill by the church...I didnt think anything about it and it was a lil smaller there  but it was just a bright light and at first i thought it was a cell tower light that wasnt blinking but at the same time it was awful bright and bigger than any cell tower light i have ever seen....But we kept goin and we almost got to the 4 way of 136 and 341 and by this time it was bigger and same brightness and i mentioned it to my hubby he said "yea that is weird i wonder what that is?" we joked about it being a ufo or something... it was like hovering over lookout mnt and by that time i knew it wasnt a cell tower and there wasnt anything around it.  we kept trying to think of possible things it could have been...It looked like a mini sun but it was white as snow like the kind u see when u weld with no helment..So we turned and kept heading to my grandmothers and you can see the mnt for my grandmothers back yard and it was still there! and it was just hovering!! so i went and layed my son down in the playpen its still early and wasnt time for him to be up when my husband said "its gone!" we didnt see where it went but it was gone completely gone.....Later i got to thinking about the only reason i am reporting this... my family lives next door to my grandmothers 160 acre cattle farm..It was my childhood home...And due to it being country we camped alot in the back yard in the summer..I was like 15 or 16 and my sis was 14 or 15 and one night my sister woke me up and made me get out of the tent and we never told anyone about it, but it looked just like that bright light my husband and i saw the other day...But that time it was bigger and it was over my grandfathers barn and followed the treeline and then diappeared as quick as that one did!!! there was no noise and the cows were not making any noise or anything there was a slight wind i remember but my sister and i never told anyone about that...(now i have told my husband )and now since i have seen this light 2 times i wanted to find someone to tell it to and find out what is goin on.
content.summary: Bright light that hovered and disappeared the second time i have seen this, first time i was a teenager and it hovered then followed the tree line and disappeared into thin air

content.detailedDescription: U really want to talk to me this was in1983 and they r still entering my house there is missing time about 2 hours as far as i can tell they r small grays if u check this out u will see i am telling the truth and this is real
content.summary: This thing chased me

content.detailedDescription: After i filed a mufon report in 2013 which i witnessed a very large triangle w/ 3 large white shimmering lights on each corner up close something came back it was about two months later and i would rather forget it. it was a fri or sat night and i was just watching rock vids on ytube maybe 2am when i heard this really low deep humming sound above me louder than the sub+speakers 60+ decibels; so i paused the video and looked at up at the ceiling towards the sound it sounded just like those strange sounds that people heard like last year like metal tectonic plates shifting at a low heavy whatever. i really cant explain it.  i once again heard something in my head or ears something just like the night i seen the huge triangle and this time i could make out what was being said it said come on outside. i looked up and for some reason i laughed out loud and said yeah right thats not gonna happen once i said that i instantly heard a loud static pop and all lights power and the computer went out? i almost messed my pants right there but as i got up to run in the dark the power instantly came back on weird thing is i have the best new pc power surge supply 2160 joules and for some reason although i watched the screen shut down and lights on the pc also and heard the power supply on the pc shut down also it just powered itself back up and i somehow did not have to reboot windows or enter password into it windows just came back on that fast. i am sorry to not write down exact date and time.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown, N/A
content.summary: Something hummed hovered overhead and shut power off with a static click

content.detailedDescription:
Subject lives near a airport and saw a  glowing orange orb come out of the   nw and start following a coast guard c130
the orb stayed 6 plane lengths behind  the c130 
the orange orb was as large as the tail fin of the plane 
15 min later two f16 fighter planes went in the same direction as the orb and a few minutes later 2 recon planes followed 

the next day, friday, subject saw the same orange orb but it just flew by, making no sound, flying in a north easterly direction

last year subject saw the same thing 
saw the orange orb in the sky following commercial aircraft but no military craft chased it

subject has lived there 11 years  
he is curious
content.summary: Subject sees orange glowing orb tailing aircraft

content.detailedDescription: White light, appeared transparent then changed into a red/orange solid object. while white, some dots lights fell from it
content.summary: White light, appeared transparent then changed into a red/orange solid object. while white, some dots lights fell from it

content.detailedDescription: It was april 28"th at 11:40 pm i woke up and i turned tv on and 5 minutes latter i heard a loud banging on one of the side or back fences it was so loud we have possums and racoons but they never made that noise it sounded like someone was hitting and kicking the fence i heard it before but down the street but first time on my fence i have my room upstairs so i jumped up and grabbed my super bright led flashlight and shined it out my bedroom window as the fence was banging and saw the woman's little dog next door calm and staring up so i look up and saw 2 reddish orange basketball or beach ball size orbs is all i can say they look like but real bright and to me looked like 10 feet over the tree they were coming from the north then they started traveling south over my house and stopped over my house so i ran woke my brother up and told him ufo's they were silent and they are outside then ran downstairs woke mom up told her i was the first out the front door and a second latter my brother and mother came out but before they made it out the door they started moving south from hovering over my house and we watched them travailing slow and one was behind the other and was lower we watched them going south and kept going after they past the peoples house across the street and the first one started to flicker out but my brother and i saw it was a saucer shape and had a matalic dark redesh orange color to the craft then it lit back up the one behind it stayed lit the whole time and we watched them going toward mt diablo it happened about from 11:40 to 11:55 i been seeing these ufo"s for 2 or 3 years but every time i been hearing those loud bangs and kicking on the fences i see the ufo"s i get a scared feeling and feel numb when they are around and my flashlights die fast i have to charge them after every time they are around but the last 2 or 3 years most of the time i see them they are parking over my neighborhood allot i don't know what they want and the womans dog next door has never been that calm before there was a possum on the fence her dog goes crazy but not hat night but i feel they want me my brother or parents know it sounds stupid but that's what i feel i tried to take a pic but bat goes dead or wont turn on i have bad fibromyalgia so its hard to type here i wish here was someone i can talk to in a mufon office i can tell better than type
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: I woke at 11:40 april 28 and looked out my window i heard like someone was kicking my fence and looked up and seen 2 red orange objects

content.detailedDescription:
Subjects father and sister going out to her mine, the lost cowgirl mine, in  august of 1947. they saw something blink and shine in the sun off the side of the road 
they drove over there  and found a silverish disk shaped craft sitting in the sand
the middle section was ripped showing metal and metallic type debris inside it came from from east by south east and crashed up against a rock ledge 
the bottom of the craft was bowl shaped  
they tried to pick it up, it weighed 70 or 80 lbs and it was 7 or 8 feet across they put in the back of the truck
they didn't know what to do with it so they took to local sheriff  in tonopah or parump 
two days later an army guy and guy in suit showed up, took the craft and said it was a matter of national security and to not talk to anyone about the
craft
they remember it had unfamiliar symbols written on it 
the craft was whole and no bodies were seen.
content.summary: Subjects father and sister found a ufo craft in the nevada desert in 1947

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in the yard video recording the sky when i seen them. it seemed like a white boomerang slowly moving threw the air . i was happy that they had made an appearance to me. it came from the front side of the house and was seen until it vanished behind the house. i was very happy that i actually saw this object more like amazed. i was kind of disappointed that they didn't try to further communicate with me. the object just vanished into thin air. the weird thing was that i saw when i was recording it looked like a white glowing boomerang but on video it captured a black dot. this was even more amazing to me .
content.summary: Black bird type ufo with white circle center under craft

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were traveling south on i15 in nevada in our semi. when he noticed a blue contrail heading nw. he pointed it out to me and when i glanced in the direction i saw a blue light, from our distance it looked the size of a golf ball, it was going in a upward path then changed course within a split second, the contrail stopped then it took off again and then vanished. i am a photographer and have witnessed some odd stuff but i have never seen anything like it. meteor maybe, but i doubtful, as it flashed, pulsed and left a very wide blue contrail. once it vanished we noticed not one but five air craft within a mile from the sighting heading the direction we seen it.
content.summary: Blue light with blue trail

content.detailedDescription: I was laying in bed about to drift off to sleep when there were 3 extremely bright flashes through the window into the room. when my eyes adjusted there was an entity looking at me with a look like it had found something it was looking for. after that there were 2 more bright flashes and i opened my eyes to find that i was standing in a long white hallway. i could feel static in the air and it was also cold feeling. i remember feeling something touch my shoulder and i turned around to find another entity behind me in a room. it used a one of its hands to motion for me to follow it into the room. in the middle of the room there was a table and the entity told me to "take a rest" (although i never saw its mouth move) it pats on the table as if to tell me to sit down. i sit down and it forces me to lay down. all i remember from that point is the back of my head hitting the table and then opening my eyes and i'm back in my home. it was almost 6 in the morning when i looked over at the alarm clock next to my bed. i had looked at my watch next to the alarm clock and it said 4:15 my husband had not noticed that i was gone the entire time and i had a nosebleed.
content.summary: 3 brights flashes followed by entity looking at me then 2 more flashes opening my eyes in a white hallway

content.detailedDescription: This witness prefers to not be identified.  it was a bizarre cloud-like structure.  as a meteorologist in atlanta for more than 30 years, i have never seen anything like it.
content.summary: Cloud-like structure

content.detailedDescription: This photo was sent to me shortly after 3 pm today.  it is a very bizarre cloud-like structure.  i have been chief meteorologist for wsb-tv in atlanta for more than 30 years and have never seen anything like it.
content.summary: Bizarre almost cloudlike

content.detailedDescription:
Subject's son while staying in a trailer park saw two grey entities
one was short and one was very tall
he can't remember what happened after that
subjects son has had night mares about being abducted and is frightful
of the experience so much so he can't sleep at night
content.summary: Subjects son saw two greys one tall one short and now has nightmares

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to field investigator:
witness saw three triangular lights that were orange, green, and blue that were rotating. they seemed to mov.E closer and further away as the size of the lights seemed to get bigger and smaller before they disappeared. this has happened on two ocassions. the second time was on or about 17 april.
content.summary: Three triangular lights

content.detailedDescription:
Subject describes one of many encounters with ufos near her home
one was hovering 10 over the asphalt and she said seemed to be playing with her kids, wobbling down the road  
subject warned off the children and approached the ufo and said it looked like a dull silver bright circle
she later experienced burns on her stomach and lost her eyebrows and some hair
she was in the hospital for seven days with out a diagnosis of what was wrong with her
the children were not affected and call the ufos miracles
she has no ill feelings toward it, she thinks she got too close and they
didn't mean to hurt her   she also claims they took her ovaries
although this event happened in 2006 she still suffers the residual after
effects
she has seen disks coming from the military base and and hoveing low 
subject has also seen ufos come out of the water
subject and family and friends have seen many ufo over several years
content.summary: Subject and family have repeatedly seen ufos land and go into water

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside smoking a cigarette, on april 24, 2014 time was about 7:30-8:00pm at night it was still light outside so the sky was still light clear blue and all you could see is the blue sky. i felt this strange sensation of looking up into the sky and in the meantime i observed this really bright object that seemed very out of place since im very familiar with the sky and star location it seemed a bit odd but as i was about to come in i noticed a lot of little small like flashing orbs ejecting or coming in to close range of that brighter object, so i if that was not strange enough lots of more orbs coming in from the se direction started coming in to close range of this much bigger object.
so of course ran in grabbed my binoculars and camera trying to see what was this strange object ejecting little like bright orbs that were fling in all sorts of direction with no path, some stopping and hovering and some cont. in a path but dimming the lights and some turning off completely so this was weird since i know of no aircraft to do such thing never the less moving very oddly stopping making sharp turns and like if waiting for a sigh from some other object. i really got scared when i started taking pictures this intelligent objects moved in for a closer look especially the big bright one and dimming its lights while it came in for closer observation of what it might be. i since that night have felt as if i'm being watched or observer or could just be plain paranoia i cant explain it. on 4-23-14 at around 4:15 4:30am i looked outside my bedroom window and to my right and there was a cigar shaped object just in mid air i say like about 10-15 feet off the ground, then my husband had got up to use the restroom and in coming back into the room he turns on light and the cigar shaped object disappears without noise. 
the next day i went out about the same time i have noticed this objects
and the same thing happens little bright orbs coming out of underneath this big bright like object and going in different path or directions and some hovering. 
it was until this morning about like 3:30 4:am i started having the same sensation that something was like hovering up close by my house and sure enough take a look out the living room window and this big bight object since i turned the lights off to go to bed started decending form the sky like a leaf falling to ground and dimming its lights as it did this, so i quickly run and turn the lights on this object starting going back up but still with the light dimmed. i also observed another object a lot higher than the brighter one side with this object i feel like its one craft object but transparent to a point to look like a star and confuse the public but as i said its very weird its been like 2 weeks and this intelligent objects moving in odd and stopping and hovering for long periods of time are cont. to appear. 

all i want is for someone with the experience in this area to please have someone come out and take a look at this very highly active area of unknown flying objects that are scaring me. as for my family thinks im going in sane. im sending what i have captured but would like to remain anonymous please.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Intelligent objects they react to flash & disk like objects, triangle like shaped objects along with diffrent size orbs

content.detailedDescription: I was just a teenage kid and we were outside, we planned to sleep on my friends trampoline. we were looking at the stars when this thing floated over us. huge,it blacked out the stars as it passed. triangle with a white light on each tip, and it was heading west. very low hum, almost silent. i started to panic when i saw it. was visible for a very long time, disappeared as it floated to the other side of town. it's been brought up in conversation over the years and i know several people from the area that have seen the same thing.
content.summary: I was a 16 year old kid, huge triangle hovered over me and my friends.

content.detailedDescription: While sitting in traffic on the mid- point bridge, i noticed a small dark object about 1000 yards away above the trees. i was on the phone with my wife and i told her there's something on the tree line. as i slowly made it over the bridge the object got closer. once i made it over the bridge the object was close enough to see detail. it got t to the point where it was right in front of my car about 200 feet off the ground. it was wobbling slowly as it drifted in front of me. it was only moving maybe ten miles per hour in a roughly se to nw direction. the object had a large central section, similar looking to a soccer ball, but not round, slightly angular. it was a dark gray/black color but the sun was reflecting off of the top of the east side of it. it had three legs, all segmented, maybe three segments on each leg. they appeared evenly spaced. it went right over my car then i lost sight of it as the traffic started moving. i'm going to make a computer drawing of it when i get home, i just wanted to get this in while it was fresh ibn my mind.
content.summary: Saw on the hirizon, approached while in traffic

content.detailedDescription: I awoke suddenly one night and turned my head to the left and looked out the window and saw bright lights in my front yard. i awoke my husband and told him somebody was outside (we thought it was a car) but when we looked again there was no car just orbs of light right outside the window. my husband flew out of the bed ran downstairs and out the front door and the lights just disappeared into thin air.
content.summary: I woke up suddenly in my bedroom turned my head and saw light orbs outside my window. i awoke my husband he ran outside they vanished.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my fiancee to work in paulding, oh. i observed an object slowly traveling north to south. the object was brighter (bright white) than a planet at night and larger in apparent size. it stopped periodically and hovered (observed about six times in 30 minutes @ about 1 time every 5 minutes (timed)). the object was flying behind the clouds, as light was shining through the clouds, and the object was casting light onto the clouds. i observed the object for about 38 minutes. approximately halfway through the observations (about 15 minutes in) the object flashed bright white once (about 7.5 minutes into the observation). this object was inside the atmosphere. i could observe this because: a.) it cast light onto the clouds and b.) when we initially left for paulding it was dark outside, however, by the time we got to paulding it was light out and all the stars/planet(s) that were visible were no longer visible; the object still remained just as brilliantly lite up. when i stopped, i couldn't hear any sounds of a plane engine or of a plane's movement. just as quickly as the object appeared, the object disappeared into the distance(southerly)(out-of-sight in about 1-2 seconds). this object moved slower in the sky than a satellite or the space station, but faster than an airplane. my fiancee was sleeping at the time in the car, i tried to wake her but she doesn't believe in ufos and refused to even look (i think she is scared of them).
content.summary: Unknown object traveling north to south, observed in eastern sky. object flying straight path stopping periodically.

content.detailedDescription:
-----------------
        l
       . .
      .   .
     .     .
    .       .
   .         .
  .           .
  l------------l

the image above is the shape of the object. i draw it because i dont knoe how to explain in words. the l's represent lights. in between the lines of the triangle it was transparent. 

it was sundown and i was on the shore of tiberius lake looking at the sky with a girl (another witness). this thing apeeared from nowhere. it had light in the corners and because it was in the sky, i couldnt estimate its size or speed but i could defenetly say it was flying toword my dirction beacuse it was growing.It was a little higher than the horizen. a minute passed and the objected multiplied. as if a clown parted from it and continued getting closer alongside the first object. after a minute the seconed object clowned itself just like the first one. now they where three. than the first one disapeared but the two clowns continued to get closer. the the second (the first clown) disapeared and than again the third.
content.summary: A triangle plus more lines. light on edges. multiplied itself. apeeared then disapeared.

content.detailedDescription:
i'm not sure where to start. there is quite alot of information that even i have a hard time accepting. i'll try to start from the beginning. i see alot of people that have had clear memories with vivid details, and most have been happening for years. mine comes in bits and pieces and just started recently. 

 i would say the whole thing started happening a few months ago. i woke up really startled one morning from some really crazy dreams. i'm a vet who's been deployed, and most of my dreams have to do with previous happenings there. that's why this one really shook me up. i can't remember everything about it, but i remember really clearly seeing a smokey filled doorway with a greyish being staring at me. i've seen pictures of "greys" but this one had a wider head with a blue tint to it. there were others there too, but i dont remember them well. it was as if they were showing themselves to me. i usually would have been really frightened by this, but i almost felt as if that was being repressed somehow. the dream ended with me cruising first person above a canal with trees canopied over it. that was it. i woke up really shaken.

 after that night, my girlfriend had these huge bruises all over the back of her leg. she has been complaining alot about her eye bothering her in the morning too. like it hurts to even wash her face. i don't think the bruise could have been from me kicking her or bumping into something, because she would clearly wake up with the size that this bruise covers. 
 
my most vivid dream happened about 2 weeks ago. i woke up in that same room, i knew it was that same room from the first initial dream. i was terrified, i looked around and saw a few greyish beings staring at me almost with discontent. i was frozen, but awake for a few seconds (in the dream). one of the beings on the right looked right into my eyes and i was asleep again. a feeling like when you're about to go under surgery right after they inject the anesthesia. 
 
 at night i always feel as if something is watching me. i think of it as straight out of a horror movie when i go to check my other rooms. it runs through my head when i see some dummy going to check behind a door where jason or freddy is hiding. nevertheless something does a really good job at making me think somethings there. we have a dog, and i figured the dog would be alerted to this as well. he's not. i'm not a great sleeper. i've had sleeping problems since i've been out of the service. late at night i watch my dog, which usually sleeps through the whole night, get up and walk around. just looking, not barking, standing in the same place everynight and then coming back to lay down.  

 i've been waking up, when i do sleep, with horrible pains in my ankle. last night i dreamt of my old squad with me, around the same street where i grew up. our platoon sergeant made me and two others take off our shirts while he poked me in the back to get skin samples off me. i could almost feel the prick in my dreams. i don't know what to make of it. either that, or i'm in denial. i'm not sure if i want this to be true, or to chalk it up to bad dreams and coincidences. 

 
 about 2 days ago i was going to take a shower, lifted up my shirt and found this reddish/purple scar on my stomach. the dreams come and go, i don't have them every night. all i can really be sure of are these bruises and scars are real and i have no way to explain them. the presence i feel at night sometimes is almost too much to handle. a grown man scared of space aliens is not something i can bring up having a beer with my friends, or relatives for that matter. i'm even uncomfortable writing this, but i have to do something about it. 

-- i was also given a few tips to draw what i've seen and to log the dreams like a journal. i've done this and that's what you're reading.--
content.summary: Abduction dreams with scars/bruises
